trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControlCollection class manages a collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: La classe DirectoryControlCollection gestisce una raccolta di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryControlCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore DirectoryControlCollection crea un'istanza di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Add aggiunge un nuovo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> at which the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object has been added.
trans-unit.target: L'indice del <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza del quale il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> è stato aggiunto l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: control is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddRange aggiunge una matrice di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetti alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> objects to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetti da aggiungere alla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: controls is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlsè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: A member of the array is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Un membro della matrice è un riferimento null (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref> in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo AddRange aggiunge un <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto alla raccolta corrente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto da aggiungere a questa raccolta.

trans-unit.source: controlCollection is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: controlCollectionè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object contains a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Contains determina se questo <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto contiene un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto da cercare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto fa parte della raccolta. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, in caso contrario.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo CopyTo copia l'intera raccolta in una matrice unidimensionale, iniziando dall'indice specificato della matrice di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice unidimensionale che costituisce la destinazione degli elementi copiati dal <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: L'indice in base zero del `array` in cui ha inizio la copia.

trans-unit.source: array is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: arrayè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: array is multidimensional -or- The number of elements in the source is greater than the available space from index to the end of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: arrayè multidimensionale o il numero di elementi nell'origine è maggiore dello spazio disponibile da index alla fine della destinazione array.

trans-unit.source: The type of the source cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di origine non può essere eseguire automaticamente il cast al tipo della destinazione array .

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Metodo IndexOf restituisce l'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> per il quale viene restituito l'indice dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto, se trovato; in caso contrario, -1.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method inserts the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Insert inserisce l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> nell'oggetto di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The index in the collection at which to insert the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'indice nella raccolta in corrispondenza del quale inserire il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto da inserire nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: valueè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero, or index is greater than the number of elements in the object.
trans-unit.target: indexè minore di zero, o index è maggiore del numero di elementi di oggetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> is read-only, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>è di sola lettura, o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> ha dimensioni fisse.

trans-unit.source: The Item property contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà dell'elemento contiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di indice di <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Contiene il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: There was an attempt to set the property to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si è verificato un tentativo di impostare la proprietà su <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method verifies that value is a object.
trans-unit.target: Consente di verificare che il metodo OnValidate value è un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a value.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non restituisce un valore.

trans-unit.source: Instead, an exception is thrown if the specified object is null or is not a valid <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl> object.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, viene generata un'eccezione se l'oggetto specificato è null o non è un valido <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl>oggetto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl>

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da valutare.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: valueè un riferimento null ( in Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: value is not a object.
trans-unit.target: valuenon è un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Remove Rimuove la prima occorrenza dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto dalla raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControl"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> is read-only, or <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"></xref>è di sola lettura, o <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryControlCollection"> </xref> ha dimensioni fisse.
